titles.title: To require that passenger vans shall be subject to the same Federal motor vehicle safety standards as are applicable to passenger motor vehicles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee Commerce, Trade, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Subjects passenger vans to the same safety standards applicable to passenger motor vehicles under the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966.
